siteMetadata.title: Portfolio
siteMetadata.description: Hi, my name is Maxim! This is my personal page where you can find out more about who I am, what I do, and the projects I'm working on.

home.description: I’ve spent a lot of time messing around in the Spigot modding scene, mostly making plugins and libraries like [HologramLib](https://github.com/HologramLib/HologramLib)

list.title: Plugin Developer
list.description: Building custom game modes using modern technologies.

list.title: Software Developer
list.description: Developed tools such as a Windows text transformation utility, GitHub stats cards, several Discord bots, APIs, and Minecraft plugins that have accumulated over 50,000 downloads across all platforms. My plugins have been featured by well-known YouTubers including KasaiSora, Ajneb97, and others.

list.title: Backend Developer
list.description: Assisted the team by designing and maintaining backend systems.

list.title: Minecraft Server Owner
list.description: Launched and managed a Minecraft server, developing infrastructure and custom game mode plugins. Collaborated with streamers such as Ypeat, Brostastic, and SimplyFuse. The server welcomed guests including GommeHD, Wichtiger, Fuxelbau, and even a Mojang employee.

list.title: Pianist
list.description: Participated in Jugend musiziert four times, consistently scoring 23 or 24 points. Performed solo and in a trio, and gave several recitals.

legal.name: Maxim
legal.legal_disclaimer: This is a personal portfolio website for demonstration purposes.

content.introduction: This portfolio website is designed with minimal data collection and maximum user privacy in mind.

sections.title: Information Collection
sections.description: We collect the following types of information:
details: Name, email, and message content submitted through the contact form
IP address for rate limiting and security purposes
Potential tracking of client-side interactions for website functionality

sections.title: Data Processing and Storage
details: Contact form submissions are processed in-memory and not permanently stored
IP addresses are temporarily tracked for rate limiting (maximum 30 minutes)
No persistent user data is saved or stored long-term

sections.title: Third-Party Services
sections.description: Potential data collection by third-party services:
details: Image hosting services (e.g., shields.io) may collect IP address during image requests
Standard browser and server logs may capture additional metadata

sections.title: Data Protection
sections.description: We implement the following protection measures:
details: Rate limiting to prevent abuse of contact form
No storage of sensitive personal information

sections.title: User Rights
details: Request deletion of any potential stored information
